title: Our Services
subtitle: Professional architectural services for your visions
description: From the first idea to key handover - we accompany you through all phases of your construction project with expertise and passion.

hero.title: Architectural Services
hero.subtitle: Professional planning and consulting for your construction project

newConstruction.title: New Construction
newConstruction.description: Individual new construction projects from single-family homes to multi-family houses and commercial buildings. Modern architecture with sustainable concepts and energy-efficient solutions.

renovation.title: Building Renovation
renovation.description: Professional renovation of historic buildings considering heritage protection, building physics and modern living standards. Preservation of original character with contemporary functionality.

interior.title: Interior Design
interior.description: Complete interior design from space layout to furnishing. Functional and aesthetic solutions for residential and commercial spaces with focus on optimal space utilization.

energy.title: Energy Consulting
energy.description: Professional energy consulting for new construction and renovation. Optimization of energy efficiency, advice on subsidies and creation of energy certificates according to current standards.

projectManagement.title: Project Management
projectManagement.description: Comprehensive project support from planning to completion. Coordination of all trades, schedule monitoring and quality control for smooth construction progress.

medical.title: Medical Practices
medical.description: Modern practice design with functional and hygienic concepts for medical facilities and therapy centers.

consultation.title: Initial Consultation
consultation.description: We discuss your ideas, requirements and project goals in a detailed consultation meeting.

analysis.title: Site Analysis
analysis.description: Comprehensive evaluation of local conditions, restrictions and possibilities of the building site.

concept.title: Concept Development
concept.description: Creation of first design concepts and exploration of various architectural solutions.

design.title: Design Planning
design.description: Refinement of the chosen concept with detailed plans and specifications.

permits.title: Permit Planning
permits.description: Preparation of construction documents and application for required building permits.

construction.title: Construction Support
construction.description: Continuous support during construction phase to ensure planning quality.

modernHome.title: Modern Single-Family Home
modernHome.outcome: Energy-efficient new construction with 40% less energy consumption than legally required.

heritage.title: Heritage-Protected Townhouse
heritage.outcome: Careful renovation under heritage protection with 60% improvement in energy efficiency.

penthouse.title: Penthouse Apartment
penthouse.outcome: Optimal space utilization with 30% more storage space and improved living quality.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to your most important questions

items.question: What is included in the initial consultation?
items.answer: Our initial consultation includes a detailed discussion of your project goals, an on-site visit if required, an initial feasibility assessment and an overview of our planning process. You will also receive a detailed offer with scope of services, schedule and investment framework for your project.

items.question: How long does a typical residential project take?
items.answer: Residential projects typically take 6-12 months from initial planning to construction clearance. Duration can vary depending on project size, complexity and decision-making process. We create detailed schedules already in the proposal phase.

items.question: Do you handle building permits?
items.answer: Yes, we support you with all required permit procedures and official coordination. Our team knows local building regulations and permit procedures and ensures your project meets all compliance standards.

items.question: Can you help with financing?
items.answer: We work with experienced financing consultants and can connect you with suitable partners. Our detailed cost calculations and planning documents simplify loan applications.

items.question: Do you offer sustainable design solutions?
items.answer: Sustainability is at the heart of our planning philosophy. We integrate energy-efficient systems, environmentally friendly materials and intelligent planning principles into all our projects.

contact.title: Let's Discuss Your Project
contact.subtitle: Ready to make your vision a reality?

pricing.title: Investment & Fees
pricing.subtitle: Transparent fee structure that provides value at every stage of your project.

payment.title: Payment Structure
payment.description: Projects are typically structured with 30% deposit, 40% upon design completion, and 30% upon project completion. We offer flexible payment plans for larger projects and provide detailed cost breakdowns during the proposal phase.

cta.title: Ready for Your Project?
cta.description: Contact us for a free consultation
